name: GOOD DOG (Willow Palecek)
description:
In GOOD DOG you play a very GOOD DOG who is out for a walk.  Make sure to stop and smell the flowers!

Includes sound effects from Game Maker Audio Megapack by Joshua Wayne and Sound Effects Variety by Mini Ninja. Font used is Mode Seven by Andrew Bulhak.

This game runs in 1280 by 780 resolution.
